answers.answer: See your doctor for a thorough examination and go from there.  That's the best way to find out what is going on as we are only lay people and cannot diagnose you.  If it turns out to be anxiety, please come back.  We're always here!  Take care and let us know what you find out.
yes, it is anxiety, i am sure but alongwith, it could be diabetes.

question: i am having burning sensation arround my neck and shoulders since last 4 months and cotinuosly loosing weight. all the time i feet upset due to burning sensation. suggest me what to do? is it acidity or neurological disorder due to stress?
title: burning sensation
